pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, July 27, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Moncton, New Brunswick

Private meetings.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make a vaccine announcement. A media availability will follow.

Moncton Coliseum
377 Killam Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.

Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Prince Edward Island, Dennis King.

Closed to media.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability. He will be joined by Premier of Prince Edward Island Dennis King, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Ahmed Hussen, Prince Edward Island’s Minister of Education and Lifelong Learning and Minister responsible for the Status of Women Natalie Jameson, and Member of Parliament for Charlottetown Sean Casey. Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence Lawrence MacAulay, Member of Parliament for Malpeque Wayne Easter, and Member of Parliament for Egmont Robert J. Morrissey, will also be in attendance. 

Carrefour de l’Isle-Saint-Jean
5 Acadian Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m. at the entrance located in the south parking lot.
  • Media are required to wear face masks while indoors.
